entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with rain showers in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero except minus 4 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low zero except minus 4 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023
